WaterCoolingLosses.cpp
1 
9 #include <cmath>
10 #include "calculator/losses/WaterCoolingLosses.h"
11 
12 double WaterCoolingLosses::getHeatLoss() {
13  double avg_temp = (this->initialTemperature + this->outletTemperature) / 2.0;
14  double avg_temp_in_celcius = (avg_temp - 32.0) / 1.8;
15  double water_density = 1000 * (1 - (avg_temp_in_celcius+288.9414)/(508929.2*(avg_temp_in_celcius+68.12963))* pow((avg_temp_in_celcius-3.9863), 2));
16  double water_density_in_lb_gal = water_density * 0.0083454;
17  heatLoss = this->flowRate * 60.0 * water_density_in_lb_gal * 1.0 * (this->outletTemperature - this->initialTemperature) * this->correctionFactor;
18  return heatLoss;
19 }
